mapper.select: select count(*) from product where product_show='Y'

select * from (select rownum as rnum, p.* from (select product_no, product_name, product_price, product_thumb from product where product_show='Y' order by product_no desc)p) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from(SELECT * from product order by product_no desc)b) where rnum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update product set product_show=#{productShow} where product_no=#{productNo}
